str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: To reckon, count, charge with; reason, decide, conclude; think, suppose.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: From dikaios; to render just or innocent.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
Apart from, separately from; without. Adverb from chora; at a space, i.e. Separately or apart from.
From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.
From a primary nemo; law, genitive case, specially, (including the volume); also of the Gospel), or figuratively.
